name: Learias Ascension - Prototype DEMO
description:
Three adventurer's are asked to retrieve a purification stone from a long forgotten shrine. 

The three heroes have unique mechanics within the normal j-rpg formula. The Black Knight uses hard hitting skills at the cost of her health. The Thief weaken enemies as well as work with poisons. The Mage has an elemental wheel of stockpiling magic: Link the right elements in succession and see their power increase with each strike.

 Quick concept made with RPG Maker MV on Steam.  Using default assets to make a game a tell a cool story. This is only a quick demo with one explorable dungeon.
